description: Variation of condition 2 of listed building consent dated 18 September 2018 (RN: 18/03781/LBC) for the architectural illumination, as part of the Illuminated River proposal, of Waterloo Bridge including the installation of fixtures, fittings and ancillary equipment and associated works, NAMELY, the variation of the wording of Condition 2 to state 'Prior to the commencement of development, details and location of fixings to be used in the installation of the hereby approved lighting scheme, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, and undertaken in accordance with the approved details'; and the addition of new condition to state 'Notwithstanding details hereby approved, prior to the commencement of the development, final details of electrical cabling, and equipment associated with the lighting scheme (including feeder pillars), including their location, size, fixing and colour shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. A sample of the housing to be erected on site for viewing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details.'
decision_conditions: LBC works in accord with apprvd plans
